description: Gov. Ken Stitt, of Oklahoma, signs bitcoin legislation HB3594 into law, ensuring it's citizens the right to: run a node, mine, & self custody.
Japanese Company Metaplanet has acquired ~19.87 BTC for 200 million yen
MassMutual Enters Crypto Realm with Grayscale GBTC Investment.

Report in South Korea 梆 that the country will soon allow bitcoin ETFs.
Revealed that asset manager Hightower bought $68 million worth of spot bitcoin ETFs.
Christopher Pan, an entrepreneur and inspirational speaker, gave the commencement address at Ohio Stadium. During his speech he promoted bitcoin.
Each month Block will be investing 10% of it's monthly gross profit from bitcoin products into purchases of bitcoin for investment.
Michael Saylor: There Is No Second Best
Lyn Alden creates video, How Money & Banking Work (& why they're broken today)
Joe Biden posted a pic of himself with laser eyes - writing: Just like we drew it up...laser eyes are associated with Bitcoiners...but unclear what Joe means
Bitcoin Spot ETFs were approved & began trading publicly.
SEC X account compromised - stating that the Bitcoin ETF was approved. It was not. SEC did not have 2FA per X.
